name: Neurospin.github.com
body:
### Welcome to Neurospin GitHub Pages.
...

### Using Git on your Linux workstations.

Quickly set up your account:
```
$ cat ~/.gitconfig
[user]
	name = PrÃ©nom Nom
	email = prenom.nom@cea.fr
$ 
```

To avoid entering your password only every time you push to GitHub:
```
$ cat >> ~/.gitconfig
[credential]
	helper = store
$ 
```

### Support
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
